ques: The _________ gemstone was highly sought after by collectors.
The _________ water from the mountain stream was crystal clear.

He made _________ visits to the library to study.
The news report contained _________ information.

The _________ desert stretched for miles without end.

The _________ occurrence left everyone puzzled.
His _________ idea revolutionized the industry.

Her _________ intentions were evident in her actions.
Her recovery was a _________ process that required patience.

The _________ impact of the decision was clear to everyone.
She had a _________ dream that she couldn't explain.

The _________ architecture of the cathedral impressed visitors.

The _________ behavior of the stranger was unsettling.

She provided _________ assistance to the injured person.
She wore a _________ gown for the special occasion.
The _________ sound of footsteps echoed in the quiet forest.
The _________ness of the universe is beyond human comprehension.
The _________ beauty of the landscape left them speechless.
The _________ solution to the problem was to restart the computer.
He met the _________ requirements for the job.
The _________ species of bird was spotted in the forest.
His _________ explanation clarified the concept for everyone.

The dish had a _________ yet delicious flavor.

The impact of climate change is becoming increasingly _________.

The _________ concern was the safety of the passengers.

He had a _________ heart and always saw the good in people.
The scientist made a _________ breakthrough in her research.
He had a _________ knowledge of history and literature.
The _________ texture of the lettuce made the salad refreshing.
The company operated on a _________ scale with global reach.
The _________ joy on their faces was heartwarming.
The _________ mind of the young prodigy amazed everyone.
The problem required _________ attention to prevent further damage.
The _________ decline of the species' population was a concern.

The morning was _________ and clear after a night of rain.

The _________ insects crawled along the forest floor.
